definitions.definition: An official document normally used for international journeys, which proves the identity and nationality of the person for whom it was issued .
examples: You will have to bring your passport to prove who you are.

definitions.definition: Any document that allows entry or passage .
Something which enables someone to do or achieve something.
examples: The tenor's voice was his passport to the international concert circuit.

definitions.definition: An identification document used by firefighters , collected when they enter a dangerous area and returned when they leave, to keep track of who is still in the area.

main_definition: An official document normally used for international journeys, which proves the identity and nationality of the person for whom it was issued .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension , informal ) Any document that allows entry or passage .
( figuratively ) Something which enables someone to do or achieve something.
An identification document used by firefighters , collected when they enter a dangerous area and returned when they leave, to keep track of who is still in the area.
